changelog.zh:
- 新增简易菜单设置，支持菜单栏保持收起状态（默认启用）
- 优化菜单栏展开/收起逻辑，非简易模式下始终展开
- 修复搜索页面背景渐变色显示问题
- 优化搜索栏高度，界面更紧凑
- 修复首页和搜索页面自动聚焦问题
- 新增菜单项鼠标悬停手型光标显示
- 菜单项选中状态保持高亮显示，不随焦点移动消失
changelog.en:
- Added simple menu setting to keep menu collapsed (enabled by default)
- Optimized menu expand/collapse logic, always expanded in non-simple mode
- Fixed search page background gradient display issue
- Optimized search bar height for more compact UI
- Fixed autofocus issues on home and search pages
- Added hand cursor on menu item hover
- Menu item selection highlight persists regardless of focus movement
